name: EnvironmentContext

methods.name: addEntityField
methods.description: Adds a field to the list of object fields that are returned in the signed request Record object when the component appears on a Visualforce page that’s placed on an object.

params.name: fieldName
params.description: The object field name that you need to add to the list of returned fields., Using ‘*’ adds all fields that the user has permission to view.

methods.name: addEntityFields
methods.description: Adds a set of fields to the list of object fields that are returned in the signed request Record object when the component appears on a Visualforce page that’s placed on an object.

params.name: fieldNames
params.description: The set of object field names that you need to add to the list of returned fields. If an item in the set is ‘*’, all fields that the user has permission to view are added.

methods.name: getDisplayLocation
methods.description: Retrieves the display location where the canvas app is being called from. For example, a value of Visualforce page.

methods.name: getEntityFields
methods.description: Retrieves the list of object fields that are returned in the signed request Record object when the component appears on a Visualforce page that’s placed on an object.

methods.name: getLocationUrl
methods.description: Retrieves the location URL of the canvas app.

methods.name: getParametersAsJSON
methods.description: Retrieves the current custom parameters for the canvas app. Parameters are returned as a JSON string.

methods.name: getSublocation
methods.description: Retrieves the display sublocation where the canvas app is being called from.

methods.name: setParametersAsJSON
methods.description: Sets the custom parameters for the canvas app.

params.name: jsonString
params.description: The custom parameters that you need to set, serialized into a JSON format string.

description: Use this interface to retrieve environment context information, such as the app display location or the configuration parameters.
